artistmod:BlueBrush.NAME: Bent Brush
artistmod:BlueBrush.FLAVOR: Damaged in a fit of anger.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #yPaint each combat, #yPaint 1 more of that #yColor.

artistmod:BrokenBrush.NAME: Broken Brush
artistmod:BrokenBrush.FLAVOR: You got angrier and totally broke it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, remove all #yColors on the #yCanvas.

artistmod:FixedBrush.NAME: Repaired Brush
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [oobley]Bent Brush. NL At the start of each combat, #yPaint 2 [oobley]Rainbow.
